array.name: array_preguntas
array.item: The transmission speed in USB 3.0 is:;50 Mbits/s;500 Mbits/s;*5000 Mbits/s;50000 Mbits/s
The IEEE has defined a specification for wireless local networks called _______, which covers the physical and liaison level:;IEEE 802.3;IEEE 802.5;*IEEE 802.11;IEEE 802.12
In the Von Neuman architecture:;the main blocks are the UC;the ALU and the CPU.;*The program is finds memory resident;Records are in main memory.;System Design Operative.
The core of a Vlan is:;*A Switch;A router;A bridge;A PLC
Linux is an operating system:;Mono-user and multitasking;*Multi-user and multitasking;Mono-user and monotasking;Mono-user
